ygData.subject: Re: Fire Fingers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... cannot comment.  However, if wizards are never suppose to tank... what good is a PB area effect spell?  It is tough enough having every monster in an area
ygData.messageBody:
On May 5, 1999, Jay Hollums wrote:

>>What good is this spell... I have never seen the damage on it so on that I
cannot comment. However, if wizards are never suppose to tank... what
good is a PB area effect spell? It is tough enough having every monster
in an area attack you when you area effect spell them at range... much
less at PB. Will some one give me some insight into this spell and others
like it (PB area damage)?<<

I've used this spell a bit when fighting gob warriors with another player. I was
working on my staff skill at the time so I WAS close to the crits and they were
being inconsiderate enough to spawn 3 at a time. It did between 8 and 23 pts
damage to all 3 crits. I don't think I'll use it very much.. but until I can afford to
buy the rest of my level 8 spells I have a slot open for it so it's there. It is sort
of spectacular graphically tho <G>.

Iggie
Level 10 Gnome Wizard
Cazic-Thule
